channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: University scholarships 2024/2025 - Students enrolled in the first year of a master's degree programme.
item.description: The University scholarships ranking for Students enrolled in the 1st year of a master's degree programme has been published.The outcome is available in your online helpdesk, under "Right to study, grants, accommodation and catering" > "if you want to access the details of the rankings published in the last two academic years".%0A

item.title: Fuorisalone 2025: call for creators
item.description: The University of Milan is looking for 40 students to participate in the project LaStataleCreators at Fuorisalone 2025 for the INTERNI Magazine event called ‚ÄúCre-Action‚Äù that will be on display from 7 to 17 April. %0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Participate in Our New Research Study!
item.description: Students are invited to take part in a new study conducted by the Department of Food, Environmental, and Nutritional Sciences. The research is part of the ONFOODS project and aims to explore the perceptions and barriers that may influence the consumption of new plant-based foods developed as alternatives to animal-derived products.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the C1 Advanced (CAE) exam on 13 + 14 May 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C1 Advanced (CAE) exam scheduled on 13 + 14 May 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 14 + 15 May 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 14 + 15 May 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for CELI exams CELI 1 i (A2) - CELI 2 i (B1) levels on 7 May 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 i A2 and CELI 2 i B1 exams scheduled on 7 May 2025.%0AN.B: seats for the CELI 1 i A2 and CELI 2 i (B1) exams are sold out.%0A %0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
